```{r}

library(tidyverse)

#Observations on the data set variables 
data(iris)
class(iris)
glimpse(iris)
# there is 150 observations and 5 variables

iris1 <- filter(iris, Species %in% c("virginica", "versicolor"), Sepal.Length > 6, Sepal.Width > 2.5)
glimpse(iris)

# 56 observations and 5 variable 


iris2 <- select(iris1, Species, Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width)
glimpse(iris2)

# 56 observations and 3 variables 

iris3 <- arrange(iris2, desc(Sepal.Length))
head(iris3, 6)

iris4 <- mutate(iris3, Sepal.Area = Sepal.Length * Sepal.Width)
glimpse(iris4)

# 56 observations and 4 variables 

iris5 <- summarize(iris4, mean_length = mean(Sepal.Length), mean_width = mean(Sepal.Width), n = n ())
print(iris5)

iris6 <- group_by(iris4, Species) %>%
    summarize(mean_length = mean(Sepal.Length),
     mean_width = mean(Sepal.Width), n = n())

print(iris6)

irisFinal <- iris %>%
    filter(Species %in% c("virginica", "versicolor"),
    Sepal.Length > 6, 
    Sepal.Width > 2.5) %>%
        select(Species, Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width) %>%
        arrange(desc(Sepal.Length)) %>%
        mutate(Sepal.Area = Sepal.Length * Sepal.Width)

glimpse(irisFinal)


iris_longer <- iris %>%
    pivot_longer(cols = c(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, Petal.Length, Petal.Width),
    names_to = "Measure",
    values_to = "Value")

```
